Ottawa Gee-Gees

Project Scope

— Social Media
— Environmental Design
— Wraps
— Merch
— Print Colaterals

I design a wide range of materials for the Gee-Gees varsity teams, from social media graphics to full wall wraps. My goal is to ensure the brand remains consistent while staying flexible enough to meet their diverse graphic needs.
